1125451401428176897.text:
Bitcoin > gold:

1. Divisibility
2. Verifiability (e.g. tungsten counterfeits)
3. Portability
4. Reduced trusted intermediaries (third-party vaults for gold storage)
5. Strict, provable scarcity (21 million BTC forever vs. gold's unknown total quantity)

#Bitcoin #BTC #DropGold
